Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: the only feedback GenAI I know is turnitin (if that counts), GenAI just helps compare work that is similar to another while teachers sometimes point out what you did wrong. they both have different use.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI just highlights it, teachers comment on your mistake, therefore i think teachers' feedback knowingly or not (and depending on how you would interpret a comment) may have tendency to feel more harsh.
